About us

We are
SETBASE

Solutions from Base to Top made in Switzerland.

Fields of expertise

Working across diverse fields gives us a broad spectrum of technology and experience to draw upon.

Medical

We excel in navigating the complex field of healthcare. Our team includes experts in biomedical engineering and collaborates closely with medical practitioners and researchers to deliver impactful solutions.

Industry 4.0

Driving innovation in industrial automation and smart manufacturing, we help businesses adopt technologies and digitalize for increased efficiency, flexibility, and competitivnes.

IoT & Building Technology

From smart homes to industrial IoT solutions, we create intelligent systems that enhance comfort, efficiency, and sustainability in buildings and connected environments.

Data and AI

Unlock the potential of data through advanced analysis, intuitive visualization, and AI-driven tools. We transform raw information into actionable insights, enabling smarter decisions and delivering measurable outcomes across industries.

Lighting and Design

Combining technical abilites with creative design, we craft stunning lighting systems and visually compelling solutions that transform spaces into places of well-being.

Academia

We supporting academic institutions, research groups and projects with tools and technology-driven solutions to accelerate innovation and enhance academic outcomes.

Marketing and Content

We empower businesses with impactful content strategies, marketing tools, and data-driven insights to effectively engage their audiences and drive growth.

Our values

We stand strong to our values and we foster and appreciate good relations with our customers and partners.

  • 1

    Customer-centric approach

    We prioritize our customers in every decision, ensuring their needs, challenges, and goals are at the heart of our solutions.

  • 2

    Constant Improvement

    We embrace a culture of learning and adaptation, continuously refining our processes, technologies, and services to deliver the best results.

  • 3

    Simplicity

    We value clarity and efficiency, delivering solutions that are straightforward, easy to use, and focused on achieving meaningful outcomes.

  • 4

    True Value

    We focus on bringing true value even if it means changing direction or starting from scratch, we embrace what brings true value.

Resources

  • Experts

    Setbase has an extensive network of specialists ranging from software engineers, professional consultants, data scientists, agile experts, and researchers to medical practitioners, product designers, content creators, and electricians.

  • EU Partners

    While we focus our core development in-house in Switzerland, we also have an extensive partner network across the EU, providing specialized expertise or additional resources when needed.

  • In-house Lab

    Our well-equipped in-house lab enables us to build, simulate, and test various products and developments efficiently.
